title: USB Disk to boot BOTH WinXp and Win7

forumNotes.author: BondUniverse
forumNotes.content:
I appologize if this is elsewhere, but I haven't found any information on this yet, even though I would think others may have done this already...  

I'm looking to create a USB drive with at least BOTH WinXP and Windows 7. I want them to be native on the disk to allow for easy updating (so no ISO images). I've found plenty on XP/2003, but not XP AND 7 on the same drive...  

A bonus would be to include 2003 and 2008 Servers...  

I would also prefer to do as much as possible by hand, but freeware (preferably open source) are ok if no alternatives (or alternatives are MUCH more difficult...)  

Any help would be greatefully apprectiated!
